game.AI

Class AI

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.AI.AI
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MediumAI, SimpleAI, TestAI

    public abstract class AI
extends Object
    Abstract parent class for all artificial intelligences.
    Author:
    Eero Kuurne

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected ArrayList<Integer> checkEmptyTableSlots(Player player)
      (Muutetaan taulukoksi) Returns the player's table slots which are empty.
      protected ArrayList<Integer> checkFilledTableSlots(Player player)
      (Muutetaan taulukoksi) Returns the player's table slots which are filled with minion.
      protected void checkLethal()
      Checks if the player has possibility to end the game on this turn and ends the game if so.
      LogicHandler getHandler() 
      Player getPlayerA() 
      Player getPlayerB() 
      protected void playHandRandomly()
      Goes through hand slots in order and places minions on table to a random slot if there is enough resources.
      protected void playMountedMinions()
      Plays mounted minions from hand to table in the order they are in hand slots.
      protected void playTableRandomly()
      Attacks random targets with every minion on the player's table.
      abstract void playTurn()
      Defines what happens when the game asks for the AI to play his turn.
      void setHandler(LogicHandler handler) 
      void setPlayerA(Player playerA) 
      void setPlayerB(Player playerB)

    • Method Detail

      • playTurn

        public abstract void playTurn()
        Defines what happens when the game asks for the AI to play his turn. Every different AI implementation has a different approach, so the method is abstract.

      • checkFilledTableSlots

        protected ArrayList<Integer> checkFilledTableSlots(Player player)
        (Muutetaan taulukoksi) Returns the player's table slots which are filled with minion.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who's table is checked
        Returns:
        Player's table slots which are filled with minion

      • checkEmptyTableSlots

        protected ArrayList<Integer> checkEmptyTableSlots(Player player)
        (Muutetaan taulukoksi) Returns the player's table slots which are empty.
        Parameters:
        player - The player who's table is checked
        Returns:
        Player's table slots which are empty

      • checkLethal

        protected void checkLethal()
        Checks if the player has possibility to end the game on this turn and ends the game if so.

      • playMountedMinions

        protected void playMountedMinions()
        Plays mounted minions from hand to table in the order they are in hand slots.

      • playTableRandomly

        protected void playTableRandomly()
        Attacks random targets with every minion on the player's table.

      • playHandRandomly

        protected void playHandRandomly()
        Goes through hand slots in order and places minions on table to a random slot if there is enough resources.
